summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account as of November 30, 2018. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and other debits, highlighting the financial activities of the account holder during the month.

persons.name: Peter Rawson
persons.context: Peter Rawson is mentioned as the account holder for a transaction involving a transfer to Bank of America.

persons.name: William G Hammond
persons.context: William G Hammond is mentioned as the account holder for a transaction involving a transfer to JPMorgan Chase Bank.

connections.description: Both individuals are mentioned in the context of outgoing money transfers from the same account.

keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for November 2018.
Peter Rawson and William G Hammond are both mentioned as account holders involved in money transfers.
The ending balance of the account as of November 30, 2018, is $783,195.73.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
